about-title-second: I am Frontend Developer based in Denmark
about-text: I am a motivated web developer with experience as a frontend developer intern at a Danish startup, where I thrived in a collaborative team environment. I completed the 9-month full-stack coding bootcamp at HackYourFuture in Aarhus. I am eager to find a dynamic workplace where I can continue to improve my skills and contribute to impactful projects.
university: Kyiv National University of Civil Engineering and Architecture
university-first-specoalization: Coding bootcamp designed to cover all aspects of full-stack development including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, MySQL and ReactJS.
university-second-specoalization: Faculty of Automation and Information Technology. Project Management Department. Master degree.
university-third-specoalization: Faculty of Automation and Information Technology. Bachelor degree.
experience-info-first: Worked with both fronted and fullstack tasks using: ReactJS, TypeScript, NodeJS, MongoDB. Developed possibility for user save preferred text size on the website and infinite scroll for search result. Created page for admin to manage users access to the website. Adjusted existing functionality to the new data model.
experience-info-second: HTML/CSS/JS coding in eCommerce platform - OpenCart. My role involves filling content, adjusting and creating modules, and modifying styles and layouts of OpenCart templates following the design developed in Photoshop or Figma. I also configure supplier modules to automate product uploads from XML/XLSX files.
